name: Boardbot Has 5 Kids
description:
Boardbot has five kids. This is his day off. His wife has the kids and he's gonna have a good time.
A game made for a jam. Thanks to my guys Keith and Juskelis for giving advice.

Controls
-------------------------
Arrow Keys/WASD - Turn/Flip
Space/J - Jump
G/Shift - Increase gravity
F - Light
R - Soft Reset
Y - Hard Reset
